body:

This license was prepared based on the Mozilla Public License ("MPL"), version 2.0. For annotation of the differences between this license and MPL 2.0, please see the OSET Foundation web site at www.OSETFoundation.org/public-license. The text of the license begins here:

EXHIBIT B - "Incompatible With Secondary License" Notice This Source Code Form is "Incompatible With Secondary Licenses", as defined by the OSET Public License, v.2.1.
